profile: The Vacuum Specialists began as a small store formerly known as South West Vacuums in the SW quadrant of Calgary. In 1985, we opened our second location in the NW quadrant of the city. In 2005, we designed a unique showroom that now serves as our head office on the corner of Centre Street and 30th Ave. Four years later, we opened our third location in Airdrie at the Luxstone Plaza. Today, we continue to focus on serving our customers well and are proud to be the exclusive dealer of many large brands of central and portable residential and commercial vacuums.
service_area:

profile:
Our Vision

Clever Vacuum is Calgary's newest vacuum shop. Our Vision is to be the number one residential & commercial vacuum shop in Canada, and we are 100% Locally owned and operated. If you love vacuums and cleaning as much as we do, we will get along just fine. We are in this business because of our passion for providing our valuable customers with the best products, services, and solutions. We want our customers to feel at ease when looking for the right vacuum products and quality service because we know how important it is for you. Here at clever vacuum, we have over 15 years of industry experience. We may be new, but our wealth of experience and knowledge sets us apart from our competitors. We take pride in our fantastic selection of products, and our service program is the best in town. The number one policy here at clever vacuum is honesty. We truly believe that honesty is the best policy. We repair all kinds and brands of vacuums and kitchen appliances, and we 100% guarantee our work. We will always be transparent and honest to our customers, so you can feel at ease knowing that you are taken care of. Let us worry about the details so you focus on the essential things that matter to you. Please support your local vacuum shop and take advantage of our quality services and products.

From The Owner Neko Shein

Our Vision is to become the number one Commercial & Residential Vacuum business in Canada. We want to deliver innovative and quality products to our customers at an affordable price. We are a one-stop solution for repairs, sales, installation, rough-ins, and service calls. We have over 15 years of industry experience and take pride in our work. Please support your local store today and take advantage of our friendly staff and quality products. Vacuum Sales & Service. Rough In & Installation. Service Call. services:
Repair
 

Not sure if you need a new vacuum or to repair your existing one? Clever Vacuum is here to help! If your vacuum cannot be fixed by other places or you simply want a second opinion, bring it to us. We repair all make and model residential & commercial vacuums, carpet cleaners, industrial polishing machines, car detailing equipment, power wheel, electric bike, and electric scooter.

 

You do not need to book an appointment. Just drop it off on your way to work and weâ€™ll take care of the rest! Our turnaround time is extremely fast, we will make every effort to have your vacuum back to you as quickly as possible.

 

The best part is we offer free estimates to all our customers so there is no risk. Once we receive the vacuum, we will diagnose the issue with our experienced technician and inform you of the cost of repairing it. You can decide whether to go ahead with the repairs or not. If you decided not to fix it, there would be no charge. We try our best to keep things as simple as possible, so you can have a seamless experience every time.

 

We stand behind our products and offer worry-free warranty support on all of the vacuums we sell. If you have a problem with any product bought from Clever Vacuum, just bring it back to us, and we will start the warranty process. If your problem is with your built-in vacuum, our experts will take the time to troubleshoot over the phone every possible fix before you bring your built-in into our service department.


Honesty is the best Policy!

 

Rough-In & Installation
 

We offer our clients CUSTOM ROUGH-IN and INSTALLATION of central vacuum systems in new or existing homes. We can arrange for one of our professional installers to come to your home for a consult to see if central vac installation is possible for your home or if another option would be available for you.

 

Service Call
 

We offer to pick-up & delivery service for central vacuum repair. You can book a service call with us by calling us or emailing us. On the day of the appointment, our technician will see if they can resolve the problem on-site for you. If they need to they will take it back to the shop for further diagnosis. After the repair is done, we will take it back to your house and install it back the way it was for you.
